NAME: Name
EMAIL_FOR_PASSWORD: Please give us a back up email address so we can provide you with a password.
LICENSE_AGREE: I agree to the license agreement.
ACCEPT_LICENSE: You need to accept our license agreement
REGISTER_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 8 characters.
CHECK_EMAIL: This doesn't look like a valid email.
SERIAL_NUMBER_HINT: The code on the down side of the sticker
DEVICE_NAME_HINT: Use a name to remember your device.
DEVICE_NAME_CHARACTERS: The name can be 4-30 characters long.
DELETE_DEVICE_CONFIRM:
Are you sure you want to delete this device?
You can always add it back later.
CONFIRM_SIGN_OUT: Are you sure you want to sign out?
SETUP_DIALOG:
We will need you to connect to the module you want to set up.

If you have already done it you can press "Continue".

Otherwise, let's take you to your WiFi settings. You should find a network called "Pointer Module".
GREETINGS:
!
What are we up to today?
